title: Can I know the process of sending a mail in repair for pixel 3a device
content:
I had a small bump with crack on my rear panel of my Pixel 3a mobile,I was suggested by Google team to give it for mail in repair. 

How safe is to send pixel device for mail in repair.
Out of curiosity, I have query whether it would be safe sending for repair and will the functioning be same once returned back?

I have purchased 11 months back and will it be under warranty ?How long will the warranty last from the date of purchase?

Please help me out
